column4: my first thoughts about ubuntu: it's great, but it's still way to advanced for most users
you are joking right? it boots everything out of the box

You really can't complain about that right? because it is the same thing when you complain about opening an ext3 in windows and it doesn't work, then can you say "windows is still too advanced for users"?
true...true...they are working hard on it, but it is very difficult to reverse engineer the proprietory format
